visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis should have categories for each month of the year, with red ticks of width 3. The y-axis should have labels styled with a font size of 12px and color #333333. The data series should include one series named 'Rainfall' with the provided data. The chart should have a custom background color of #f4f4f4, and the legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart. The chart should also have a margin of 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis is set with categories for each month of the year, styled with red ticks of width 3. The y-axis includes a title 'Rainfall (mm)' with a font size of 14px and color #333333, and the labels on the y-axis are styled with a font size of 12px and the same color. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with the given data points. The chart has a custom background color of #f4f4f4 and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
